sentence.english: She doesn't straighten her curly hair often.
sentence.spanish: Ella no se alisa su pelo rizado a menudo.

sentence.english: Are you keeping your hair straight for the wedding?
sentence.spanish: ¿Vas a mantener tu pelo liso para la boda?

sentence.english: She was blonde as a child but her hair darkened.
sentence.spanish: Ella era rubia de niña pero su pelo se oscureció.

sentence.english: He isn't growing a beard because his job doesn't allow it.
sentence.spanish: Él no se está dejando barba porque su trabajo no lo permite.

sentence.english: Did your grandfather have a moustache all his life?
sentence.spanish: ¿Tu abuelo tuvo bigote toda su vida?

sentence.english: He is going bald but he doesn't mind at all.
sentence.spanish: Él se está quedando calvo pero no le importa nada.

sentence.english: They aren't tall enough for the rollercoaster.
sentence.spanish: Ellos no son lo suficientemente altos para la montaña rusa.

sentence.english: She maintains a slim figure through yoga and healthy eating.
sentence.spanish: Ella mantiene una figura delgada mediante yoga y alimentación saludable.

sentence.english: Are most people in your office average height?
sentence.spanish: ¿La mayoría de las personas en tu oficina son de estatura media?

sentence.english: He became very thin during his recovery.
sentence.spanish: Él se volvió muy delgado durante su recuperación.

sentence.english: I'm not short compared to my classmates.
sentence.spanish: No soy bajo comparado con mis compañeros de clase.

sentence.english: Is your doctor helping you with your overweight issues?
sentence.spanish: ¿Tu médico te está ayudando con tus problemas de sobrepeso?

sentence.english: Her hair is getting wavier with the humidity.
sentence.spanish: Su pelo se está volviendo más ondulado con la humedad.

sentence.english: She isn't happy with her frizzy hair in this weather.
sentence.spanish: Ella no está contenta con su pelo encrespado en este clima.

sentence.english: He was styling his hair spiky for the concert.
sentence.spanish: Él se estaba peinando el pelo de punta para el concierto.

sentence.english: Are you growing your hair shoulder-length again?
sentence.spanish: ¿Te estás dejando crecer el pelo hasta los hombros otra vez?

sentence.english: She didn't like her layered haircut at first.
sentence.spanish: A ella no le gustó su corte en capas al principio.

sentence.english: She is considering going from brunette to blonde.
sentence.spanish: Ella está considerando pasarse de castaña a rubia.

sentence.english: He wasn't always a redhead; he started dyeing it last year.
sentence.spanish: Él no siempre fue pelirrojo; empezó a teñírselo el año pasado.

sentence.english: Are people with ginger hair really more sensitive to sunlight?
sentence.spanish: ¿Las personas con pelo pelirrojo son realmente más sensibles a la luz solar?

sentence.english: She isn't dyeing her black hair anymore.
sentence.spanish: Ella ya no se tiñe más el pelo negro.

sentence.english: He is embracing his grey hair as he gets older.
sentence.spanish: Él está aceptando su pelo gris a medida que envejece.

sentence.english: She wasn't happy with her dyed hair colour.
sentence.spanish: Ella no estaba contenta con el color de su pelo teñido.

sentence.english: Are you getting highlights for the summer?
sentence.spanish: ¿Te vas a hacer mechas para el verano?

sentence.english: He likes the stubble look for casual Fridays.
sentence.spanish: A él le gusta el look de barba de varios días para los viernes casuales.

sentence.english: He wasn't sure about growing a goatee at first.
sentence.spanish: Él no estaba seguro sobre dejarse perilla al principio.

sentence.english: He isn't staying clean-shaven for the interview.
sentence.spanish: Él no va a mantenerse afeitado al ras para la entrevista.

sentence.english: The builder had a stocky but strong build.
sentence.spanish: El albañil tenía una constitución fornida pero fuerte.

sentence.english: Are you trying to become more muscular at the gym?
sentence.spanish: ¿Estás intentando volverte más musculoso en el gimnasio?

sentence.english: She maintains an athletic figure through daily training.
sentence.spanish: Ella mantiene una figura atlética mediante entrenamiento diario.

sentence.english: She wasn't always petite; she grew taller recently.
sentence.spanish: Ella no siempre fue menuda; creció recientemente.

sentence.english: The baby has lovely plump cheeks.
sentence.spanish: El bebé tiene unas mejillas rellenitas preciosas.

sentence.english: He isn't obese but his doctor warned him about weight gain.
sentence.spanish: Él no es obeso pero su médico le advirtió sobre el aumento de peso.

sentence.english: The rugby player was naturally well-built.
sentence.spanish: El jugador de rugby era naturalmente bien constituido.

sentence.english: Are most of your friends medium height?
sentence.spanish: ¿La mayoría de tus amigos son de estatura media?

sentence.english: Her freckles aren't very noticeable in winter.
sentence.spanish: Sus pecas no son muy notorias en invierno.

sentence.english: The baby's dimples appeared every time she laughed.
sentence.spanish: Los hoyuelos del bebé aparecían cada vez que se reía.

sentence.english: She isn't young-looking because of expensive creams.
sentence.spanish: Ella no tiene apariencia joven por cremas caras.

sentence.english: Are most of your colleagues middle-aged?
sentence.spanish: ¿La mayoría de tus colegas son de mediana edad?

sentence.english: He was helping the elderly gentleman cross the street.
sentence.spanish: Él estaba ayudando al anciano a cruzar la calle.

sentence.english: She is always well-groomed for business meetings.
sentence.spanish: Ella siempre está arreglada para las reuniones de negocios.

sentence.english: He wasn't always so scruffy before university.
sentence.spanish: Él no siempre fue tan desaliñado antes de la universidad.

sentence.english: Are you getting tattooed this weekend?
sentence.spanish: ¿Te vas a tatuar este fin de semana?

sentence.english: She doesn't have pierced ears despite the trend.
sentence.spanish: Ella no tiene las orejas con piercings a pesar de la moda.
